description: Provides information about the status of the OpenTelemetry Collector

targets.expr:
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container" }[5m])) by (container, pod, namespace)
  /
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container"}[5m])) by (container, pod, namespace)

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container" }[5m])) by (container, pod, namespace)
  /
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container"}[5m])) by (container, pod, namespace)

(sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container" }) by (pod) 
/ sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container"}) by (pod) ) * 100

(sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container" }) by (pod) 
/ sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container"}) by (pod) ) * 100

(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container", image!=""}) by (pod) 
/ sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container"}) by (pod)) * 100

(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container", image!=""}) by (pod) 
/ sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="opentelemetry", container="otc-container"}) by (pod)) * 100

options.content: ## Rate of Metrics received by collector

panels.description: Rate of spans successfully accepted vs refused per second
panels.title: Spans Accepted vs Refused /Second

panels.description: Rate of metrics successfully accepted vs refused per second
panels.title: Metrics Accepted vs Refused Received/Second

## Rate of Metrics sent to Prometheus

panels.description: Rate of spans successfully exported vs Failed per second
panels.title: Spans Exported vs Failed / Second

panels.title: Metrics Exported vs failed /Second

title: OpenTelemetry Collector
